title.narrative: F.a: Guinean Association for the Formation and social Integration of People With Disabilities

description.narrative: This project aims at providing literacy to 25 people with disabilities, as well as at providing vocational training to 14 PWDs who will get skills on bamboo furniture production. the project is also for equipping a workshop where persons with disabilities will produce furniture. After the project, the trainees will work in the workshop between 6 and 12 months. During this period, they will be supported on finding their own workshops so they can gain independence.
